hero.title: José Camilo Joga Guerrero.
hero.subtitle: I build cloud & automation solutions.
hero.description: I'm a DevOps & Cloud Engineer specializing in building and optimizing infrastructure through automation, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, and hybrid cloud environments. Currently focused on streamlining deployments and infrastructure management for enterprise solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Jose Camilo (please call me Camilo), a Computer Science Engineer graduate from Santo Domingo with a passion for DevOps practices and cloud technologies. I specialize in creating efficient, scalable, and automated infrastructure solutions.
about.paragraph2: My expertise lies in automating deployments, implementing robust CI/CD pipelines, and managing infrastructure as code across hybrid cloud environments. I enjoy optimizing operations and workflows to help teams deliver software more efficiently.
about.skills: Here are some technologies I've been working with recently:

arroyo.title: DevOps Engineer
responsibilities: Manage and optimize Kubernetes clusters (EKS, AKS) for various applications
Optimize cloud costs by implementing resource management best practices
Manage big application projects with global impact

flBetances.title: DevOps Intermediate Engineer
responsibilities: Implement cloud migration strategies for clients moving to AWS and Azure
Develop infrastructure automation using Terraform and PowerShell
Create and maintained containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes
Design and implement CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and GitLab CI for enterprise clients

shadowSoft.title: DevOps Consultant
responsibilities: Provide consulting services for clients implementing DevOps practices
Build CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab
Implement container orchestration solutions with Kubernetes
Train client teams on DevOps methodologies and tools
Implement Infrastructure as Code solutions with Terraform and Ansible for multi-cloud environments
Create and maintain monitoring solutions using Dynatrace for critical production systems

cicd.title: Multi-Environment CI/CD Pipeline
cicd.description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive CI/CD pipeline using GitLab CI that supported development, staging, and production environments with automated testing, deployment, and rollback capabilities.

iac.title: Infrastructure as Code for Multi-Cloud
iac.description: Created a modular Terraform codebase for managing AWS and Azure resources, including networking, compute, storage, and security components, with a focus on reusability and maintainability.

monitoring.title: Kubernetes Monitoring Solution
monitoring.description: Implemented a comprehensive monitoring solution for Kubernetes clusters using Dynatrace, with custom dashboards, alerts, and automated remediation for common failure scenarios.

infrastructure.title: Automated Infrastructure Deployment
infrastructure.description: Developed Ansible playbooks and roles for automating the deployment and configuration of application servers, databases, and networking components across multiple environments.

portal.title: Internal DevOps Portal
portal.description: Created a web-based portal using Vue.js that provided a unified interface for deploying applications, managing infrastructure, and viewing monitoring metrics across development teams.

containerization.title: Containerization Migration
containerization.description: Led the migration of legacy applications to containerized environments using Docker and Kubernetes, including the development of optimized container images and orchestration configurations.
